meanings.sent1: She found a threescore candles on the birthday cake.

meanings.definition: A group of sixty individuals or things
meanings.sent1: The choir consisted of a threescore singers.
meanings.sent2: A threescore of apples fell from the tree.
meanings.sent3: The threescore students lined up for the field trip.

meanings.sent5: The threescore birds chirped harmoniously in the trees.
